Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had 32 points and nine assists
Jalen Duren had 14 points and 12 rebounds
Anfernee Simons had 36 points and nine assists
Malik Beasley hit a 3-pointer to put the Pistons ahead 114-110
Pre-Game Insights: Detroit hasn't been.500 after New Year's since it finished 41-41 in 2018-19
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blazers led by 22 points in the first half
Others: The Pistons (18-18) have won seven of eight
Portland outshot Detroit 53.3% to 44.7% from the floor, but went 3 of 5 from the free-throw line while Detroit was 19 of 22. The Pistons also had a 17-7 edge in offensive rebounds
The Trail Blazers: At New Orleans on Wednesday
